Name: ChestPainType
Category: TA: Typical Angina, ATA: Atypical Angina, NAP: Non-Anginal Pain, ASY: Asymptomatic

Name: RestingECG
Category: Normal: Normal, ST: having ST-T wave abnormality, LVH: showing left ventricular hypertrophy by Estes' criteria

Name: ST_Slope
Description: the slope of the peak exercise ST
Category: Up: upsloping, Flat: flat, Down: downsloping
